title: 93/520/EEC: Council Decision of 27 September 1993 amending Decision 93/16/EEC on the extension of the legal protection of topographies of semiconductor products to persons from the United States of America and certain territories
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 27 September 1993 amending Decision 93/16/EEC on the extension of the legal protection of topographies of semiconductor products to persons from the United States of America and certain territories
(93/520/EEC)THE  COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 93/16/EEC shall be replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision shall apply from 1 November 1993.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 September 1993.
For the Council
The President
R. URBAIN
(1) OJ No L 24, 27. 1. 1987, p. 36.
(2) OJ No L 11, 19. 1. 1993, p. 20.
ANNEX
Anguilla
Aruba
Bermuda
British Indian Ocean Territory
British Virgin Islands
Cayman Islands
Channel Islands
Falkland Islands
Hong Kong
Isle of Man
Montserrat
Netherlands Antilles
Pitcairn
St Helena

South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Turks and Caicos Islands
